name: Crimelife 3 Remastered
description:
13 years after the release of the original hit game, Crimelife 3 Remastered is back and better than ever!

Developed from scratch in Unity by one person as a personal project mostly to learn from it and over time it evolved to something much bigger than expected.

Crimelife 3 Remastered is an open-world action game that gives you the freedom to play the way  you want. Developed as a pick up and play game you create the rules, you can become a criminal and fight against the law or you can do various activities to earn some extra money.

The choice is yours!

The project will evolve over time so your feedback is very important.
